attributes.action: Reschedule any bank holidays affected by the Covid 19 crisis
attributes.additional_details:
Nobody is able to enjoy the bank holidays at this time and no business will benefit from it.  NHS and other key workers will continue to work, regardless of the bank holidays.  Pubs, restaurants, national parks etc can not benefit from increased footfall as no one can do anything while the lockdown is in effect.

If the bank holidays are moved, everybody, including those currently still working can benefit from and enjoy them
attributes.background: Reschedule any bank holidays affected by he Covid 19 crisis to dates after the country is back to some sense of normality and the lockdown is no longer in place

rejection.details:
